description: A ''PATROL Information'' trap indicates a PATROL Information event has
occurred. Specific information is detailed below.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PATROL-MIB::patrolInformation PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapText s EXAMPLE PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapOrigin s EXAMPLE PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapExtra s EXAMPLE

description: String passed from PSL to inform about the trap reason
or event information.
variables.name: PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapText

description: Name of the object that originated the trap.
variables.name: PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapOrigin

description: Extra information, usually parameter value.
variables.name: PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapExtra

description: A ''PATROL State Change'' trap indicates a monitored PATROL object
has changed status. Specific information is detailed below.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PATROL-MIB::patrolChangeStatus PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapText s EXAMPLE PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapOrigin s EXAMPLE PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapExtra s EXAMPLE

description: String passed from PSL to inform about the trap reason
or event information.
variables.name: PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapText

description: Name of the object that originated the trap.
variables.name: PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapOrigin

description: Extra information, usually parameter value.
variables.name: PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapExtra

description: A ''PATROL Warning'' trap indicates a monitored PATROL object is in the
warning state. Specific information is detailed below.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PATROL-MIB::patrolWarning PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapText s EXAMPLE PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapOrigin s EXAMPLE PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapExtra s EXAMPLE

description: String passed from PSL to inform about the trap reason
or event information.
variables.name: PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapText

description: Name of the object that originated the trap.
variables.name: PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapOrigin

description: Extra information, usually parameter value.
variables.name: PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapExtra

description: A ''PATROL Alarm'' trap indicates a monitored PATROL object is in the
alarm state. Specific information is detailed below.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PATROL-MIB::patrolAlarm PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapText s EXAMPLE PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapOrigin s EXAMPLE PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapExtra s EXAMPLE

description: String passed from PSL to inform about the trap reason
or event information.
variables.name: PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapText

description: Name of the object that originated the trap.
variables.name: PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapOrigin

description: A ''PATROL V1 State Change'' trap indicates a monitored PATROL object
has changed status. Specific information is detailed below.
String passed from PSL to inform about the trap reason
or event information.
variables.name: PATROL-MIB::patrolTrapText
